metadata.dc:title: Autoritratto in movimento
metadata.dc:creator: Marta Battaglia
metadata.dc:subject: Effort
Time
Self-portait
Photography
metadata.dcterms:abstract: This memory is provided by Marta Battaglia. She wants to represents with a self-portait her way to experience the more free time given by the COVID-19 quarantine.
metadata.dc:description: PRODUCE, CONSUME, INVEST. Quarantine gifted us with time (or better, gave us back time). What to do with this time has been clear to many: produce something new; consume all those media pending; invest time to improve your abilities. But I rediscovered the beauty of wasting time. I love dancing and I always try to improve myself, but not this time: in this photo I was just having fun with automatic shutter. I didnâ€™t want to produce a nice photo, I wanted to fix in memory the time I was marvelously wasting.
